Update.Name: CoreMonitor v2.8
Update.Description: Numerous fixes and tweaks to improve usability and functionality.
Update.ChangeLog: - No longer uses the version in the name of the applet in order to reduce problems on systems after updating CoreMonitor - New background rendering code to improve performance and memory usage. - Slightly modified UI with nicer effects (drop shadows etc.) with no performance hit (thanks to new drawing code) - Clock added to the user interface - Massive improvement in responsiveness of the CPU usage update code - Better update code with the ability to target individual platforms directly - Fixed some crashes and bugs - Updated WebAPI and documentation pages - Updated HTTPHost code to improve stability

Update.Name: CoreMonitor v2.6
Update.Description: Adds the ability to specify the length of time for which a notification is displayed as well as adding automatic update functionality.
Update.ChangeLog: - Automatic update functionality - Notification display times can be controlled through the API - Fix to prevent multiple instances of CoreMonitor from starting which would cause both to fail.

Update.Name: CoreMonitor v2.5 x64
Update.Description: Completely new notifications API with support for registering custom menu items and receiving notifications when they are used.
Update.ChangeLog: - New notifications API with support for registering custom menus. - Sockets based to allow cross framework communication. - Supports sending icons for notification messages - Notifications now have rounded corners - Notifications can now display icons to make understanding them easier. - New update code supporting automatic replacement of updated files.
